      Returns:
      the root of the file

      javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException

    • getMessageTag

      public static java.lang.String getMessageTag​(java.lang.String file, java.lang.String tagName) throws MalformedMessageException
      This method gets the the string present in the XML file at the specified tag
      Parameters:
      file - XML file which represents the message
      tagName - the name of the tag of interest
      Returns:
      a String which is the value present in the file at the specified tag
      Throws:
      MalformedMessageException - if there is a failure during the parsing, which means that the file is not well formed

    • createNewDocument

      protected static org.w3c.dom.Document createNewDocument() throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
      this method is used to create a XML document
      Returns:
      the new XML document
      Throws:
      javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - if the DocumentBuilder was not correctly opened

    • createMessage

      protected static java.lang.String createMessage​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> elements) throws MalformedMessageException
      this method is used to create a XML message String
      Parameters:
      elements - is the map of the tags and the contents to be inserted in the message
      Returns:
      an String that represents the XML message
      Throws:
      MalformedMessageException - if any error occurs during the creation of the xml string.

    • createXMLString

      protected static java.lang.String createXMLString​(org.w3c.dom.Document document) throws javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
      this method is used to create a XML String from a XML document
      Parameters:
      document - is the target document
      Returns:
      return the XML String
      Throws:
      javax.xml.transform.TransformerException - if the Transformer was not correctly instantiated
